alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brevard and southeastern Orange Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, Port Saint John, Titusville Airport and Christmas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Orange
